page.title: 16Possessions
page.content: From all the information we received from the questionnaires we found out what possessions people owned.This is the information we collected. 208 homes out of 220 had a{washing {machine.}A washing machine is most popular because it is easier than washing by hand. A number of homes have{colour {televisions}.197 homes have a colour television.There were also 120 homes with{black and white}televisions. {Videos}and{tumble dryers}were about as popular as each other.In fact there were 95 tumble dryers and 87 videos. { Computers}and{microwaves}were almost as popular as each other.There were 43 microwaves and 69 computers. There were very few{dishwashers.}In fact only 12 people own a dishwasher.
